mapper.sql: seqno, insert_time, cordoned_time, outorgan, organ_id, prono, custom_type, custom, parpers_no, content, return_result, cordoned_file, remark, case_money, work_position, cordoned_fileno, present_grade, ontime_send, issend_big, issend_sus, check_reason, papers_type, pay_time, pay_way, product_type, is_identify, is_freeze, case_status, policy_status, path
mapper.select: select path from t_cordoned where seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(1) from t_cordoned where 1=1
and organ_id like '%${organId}%'
and insert_time >= #{startInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and insert_time <= date_add(#{endInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 1 day)
and cordoned_time >= #{startCordonedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and cordoned_time <= date_add(#{endCordonedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 1 day)
and outorgan like '%${outorgan}%'
